addTCAPVault(address,address).details: Only owner can call itValidates if _tcap is validValidates if _vault is valid

enableTCAPCap(address,bool).details: Only owner can call itValidates if _tcap is valid

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseVault(address).details: Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid

removeTCAPVault(address,address).details: Only owner can call itValidates if _tcap is validValidates if _vault is valid

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setEmergencyBurnFee(address).details: Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid

setEmergencyLiquidationPenalty(address).details: Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid

setTCAPCap(address,uint256).details: Only owner can call itValidates if _tcap is valid

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpauseVault(address).details: Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid

emergencyCalled.details: tracks which vault was emergency called

GuardianSet(address,address).notice: An event emitted when the guardian is updated

TransactionExecuted(address,uint256,stri.notice: An event emitted when a transaction is executed

enableTCAPCap(address,bool).notice: Enables or disables the TCAP Cap

executeTransaction(address,uint256,strin.notice: Allows the owner to execute custom transactions

guardian().notice: Address that can set to 0 the fees or pause the vaults in an emergency event

retrieveETH(address).notice: Retrieves the eth stuck on the orchestrator

setBurnFee(address,uint256).notice: Sets the burn fee of a vault

setEmergencyBurnFee(address).notice: Sets the burn fee to 0, only used on a black swan event

setEmergencyLiquidationPenalty(address).notice: Sets the liquidation penalty of a vault to 0, only used on a black swan event

setGuardian(address).notice: Sets the guardian of the orchestrator

setLiquidationPenalty(address,uint256).notice: Sets the liquidation penalty of a vault

setRatio(address,uint256).notice: Sets the ratio of a vault

setTCAPCap(address,uint256).notice: Sets the TCAP maximum minting value

userdoc.notice: Orchestrator contract in charge of managing the settings of the vaults, rewards and TCAP token. It acts as the owner of these contracts.
